meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of veins.
meanings.sent1: The veinal patterns on the leaves were intricate.
meanings.sent2: Her veinal hands showed years of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The cake had a veinal design made of frosting.
meanings.sent4: The road map had veinal lines showing the highways.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a veinal landscape with winding rivers.

meanings.sent1: The veinal skin on the back of his hand was visible.
meanings.sent2: The veinal leaves of the plant were green and vibrant.
meanings.sent3: The veinal marble statue looked almost lifelike.
meanings.sent4: The veinal wings of the butterfly were delicate and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The veinal petals of the flower added texture to the bouquet.

meanings.sent1: The veinal cracks in the wall looked like tree branches.
meanings.sent2: The veinal patterns in the marble were striking.
meanings.sent3: The veinal clouds in the sky seemed to dance.
meanings.sent4: The veinal roads on the map connected the cities.
meanings.sent5: The veinal branches of the tree reached towards the sky.
